duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and manage large process and infrastructure improvement projects, including water and treatment systems.
Prepare budgets and proposals, generate detailed design drawings, scope criteria and schedules, write technical specifications and proposals for procurement.
Coordinate efforts of several departments and provide a leadership role in the development, installation, and monitoring of each project through commissioning.
Manage and coordinate with contractors, consultants, and local or state officials using both verbal and written communication.
Complete and submit all permit applications to the appropriate agencies and ensure projects are compliant throughout the design and construction stages.
Perform technical and feasibility studies from design to commissioning.
Meticulous attention to detail with superb organizational skills. Excellent time management skills to ensure project deadlines are met.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering or related field (Professional Engineering license preferred)
